Country Group:
Group A 
Large countries with large population
Countries: South Africa, Egypt, Nigeria, Ethiopia, DRC, Algeria, Tanzania, Kenya, Sudan

Country Group:
Group B
Small countries with relatively small population
Countries: Morocco, Tunisia, Libya, Mauritania, Senegal, Guinée-Conakry, Mali, Niger, Burkina Faso, Sierra Leone, Liberia, Côte d'Ivoire, Ghana, Togo, Benin, Chad, Central African Republic, South Sudan, Somalia, Eritrea, Cameroon, Congo-Brazzaville, Gabon, Angola, Zambia, Zimbabwe, Namibia, Malawi, Mozambique, Rwanda, Burundi, Uganda

Country Group:
Group C
Countries not in A & B
Countries: The Gambia, Equatorial Guinea, Lesotho, Eswatini, Djibouti, Guiné-Bissau
